description: All you need to write Markdown (keyboard shortcuts, table of contents, auto preview and more)
markdown.extension.toc.create.title: Markdown: Create Table of Contents
markdown.extension.toc.update.title: Markdown: Update Table of Contents
markdown.extension.printToHtml.title: Markdown: Print current document to HTML
title: Markdown All in One
markdown.extension.toc.levels.descriptio: Range of levels for table of contents. Use `x..y` for level x to y
markdown.extension.toc.unorderedList.mar: Use `-`, `*` or `+` in the table of contents (for unordered list)
markdown.extension.orderedList.marker.de: `one`: always use `1.` as ordered list marker; `ordered`
markdown.extension.italic.indicator.desc: Use `*` or `_` to wrap italic text
markdown.extension.showExplorer.descript: Show outline view in explorer panel
markdown.extension.tableFormatter.normal: Normalize table indentation to closest multiple of configured tabSize
markdown.extension.print.absoluteImgPath: Convert image path to absolute path
markdown.extension.print.imgToBase64.des: Convert images to base64 when printing to HTML
markdown.extension.syntax.plainTheme.des: Only take effect when `extension.syntax.decorations` is enabled
print.revertingToImagePaths.text: . Reverting to image paths instead of base64 encoding
print.ENOENT.text: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open
util.cannotUse.text: Cannot use VSCode built-in slugify function, fall back to GitHub slugify funtion. Try to update VSCode to the latest version or set setting `githubCompatibility` to `true`
util.1.3.0.text: Introduce an exciting feature! Auto renumbering ordered list.
util.1.4.0.text: Many new features of Markdown-All-in-One v1.4.0
util.1.5.0.text: Long time no see. Welcome to Markdown-All-in-One v1.5.0.
